title: worthless championship jewels
body: got a lot of that jewels and its just sitting right in the crafting loot got nothing to do with it also guys did an expiration date.. also for sale in store for 150 ip for nothing ..  is this a joke?

replies.body: The jewels are for team icons that you want to support.  You'll find a Championship Icon for IP, and team icons for RP (where a portion of proceeds go to that team).  In the store, go to Accessories and select Summoner Icons on the left side.  Hope that helps!
